name: xmrt-ecosystem
description: Full-stack XMRT-Ecosystem DAO prototype with Eliza AI integration

scripts.build: cd frontend/xmrt-dao-frontend && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend/xmrt-dao-frontend && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "bash -c "cd backend/xmrt-dao-backend && source venv/bin/activate && python src/main.py"" "cd frontend/xmrt-dao-frontend && pnpm run dev"

author: Joseph Andrew Lee (DevGruGold)
